To study the differentiation of Th1 cells coproducing <extra_id_0> IFN-gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IL-10 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , we cultured purified TCR - transgenic DO11.10 naive <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + Tcells with purified DCs as APCs and increasing doses of <extra_id_0> ovalbumin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> peptide 323-339 ( <extra_id_0> OVA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) .

text: Culture with high doses of antigen for 7 days gave rise to Th1 cells expressing <extra_id_0> IFN-gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> upon restimulation ( Constant etal . , 1995 ; Hosken etal . , 1995 ) , but not <extra_id_0> IL-10 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( FigureS1A available online ) .
